questions.paragraph: Panther chameleon can hunt and avoid becoming prey at the same time. Mention the reason.
popup: Due to its ability to move each eye independently of the other, it searches for insects with one eye to capture them and monitors predators with the other eye.

questions.paragraph: The Fennec fox lives in the hot desert, while the Arctic fox lives in the cold desert. Which one has long ears? And why?
popup: The Fennec fox is the one that has long ears; they help in heat dissipation and cooling its body.

questions.paragraph: How does the acacia tree defend itself if an animal tries to eat its leaves?
popup: It secretes a toxin that makes the taste of the leaves unpleasant.

questions.paragraph: Environmental pollution resulting from human activities not only harms plants and animals but also affects humans. Mention an example of this.
popup: The difficulty in obtaining clean water.

questions.paragraph: What happens If a white bull shark has a black belly and a white back?
popup: He would lose the advantage of camouflage during hunting with the counter shading.
